summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal street railway system; providing for the acquisition of, and payment for, certain new and additional motor busses; declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be; authorizing warrants on, and appropriating funds from, the surplus in the City Railway Fund as a temporary advance to Capital Account, in order to defray the expense thereof; and authorizing and directing the execution of certain agreements with respect thereto.
